name: Empty Shop Research Project
body:
Hello, 

Thank you very for your help on this project. We are very much looking forward to working with you. 

A little about us: 

### [IDEA] Foundry 

Pop up space innovation lab.High street space for entrepreneurs to test, sell and market their ideas.

Revitalising communities and kick starting local economies!

### The research project that we need you to execute. 

We need a comprehensive list of the empty shops in the following London boroughs

* Westminster 
* Islington
* Camden
* Hackney 
* Southwark 

![London Boroughs ](http://directory.londoncouncils.gov.uk/images/boroughmap.gif)

## The information we need is: 

* The council
* The address
* The use class
* The size in square feet 
* The landlord / agency / property owner reponsible for the property 
* Contact details for The landlord / agency / property owner responsible for the property 

We need at least 25 empty shop records per borough by Saturday October 26th,2013. 

The data will need to we be inputed here http://bit.ly/1eyLcPc

We will need your email address to invite to the document. 

Please feel free to ask questions to Matthew Denham @ popup@ideafoundry.co

## Use class information

### Use Classes

The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) puts uses of land and buildings into various categories known as 'Use Classes'.

The following list gives an indication of the types of use which may fall within each use class. Please note that this is a guide only and it's for local planning authorities to determine, in the first instance, depending on the individual circumstances of each case, which use class a particular use falls into.

* A1 Shops - Shops, retail warehouses, hairdressers, undertakers, travel and ticket agencies, post offices (but not sorting offices), pet shops, sandwich bars, showrooms, domestic hire shops, dry cleaners, funeral directors and internet cafes.

* A2 Financial and professional services - Financial services such as banks and building societies, professional services (other than health and medical services) including estate and employment agencies and betting offices.

* A3 Restaurants and caf√©s - For the sale of food and drink for consumption on the premises - restaurants, snack bars and cafes.

* A4 Drinking establishments - Public houses, wine bars or other drinking establishments (but not night clubs).

* A5 Hot food takeaways - For the sale of hot food for consumption off the premises.
